name: Million on Mars: Land Rush
storyline: Your settlement lives in the same world as our flagship PC MMO game, Million on Mars, but you're part of Leon Dusk's rogue flights outside the central Ad Astra Development Zone. The stakes are higher, the rewards are greater and the economy is booming -- just make sure you don't range too far toward Velma Patel's secret lair, or she might do something truly drastic...
summary: Million on Mars: Land Rush, is a 2D browser-based play-to-earn game that uses NFTs on the WAX blockchain. Players in Land Rush partner with DuskWorks co-founder Leon Dusk in a not-so-secret settlement just outside of the view of the Ad Astra Unlimited headquarters in Valles Marineris. Land Rush features similar elements of crafting and land development, but with a more simplified approach to realism and science, and a greater emphasis on creating a rich player-owned economy to support the game as it evolves. We see a future in which time spent playing games like Land Rush can not only be incredibly fun and engaging but also provide an economic opportunity for players who invest their time and resources skillfully.
